summary: MY AIRBAG ICON LIGHTS UP MOST OF THE TIME THAT  IAM  DRIVING THE FORD DEALERSHIP SAYS IT MEANS THAT THE AIR BAG WOULD NOT DEPLOY IN AN ACCIDENT AND THAT I WOULD HAVE TO PAY THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS TO FIX IT I TOLD THE MANAGER  WHY IS THAT ON ME ITS NOT  APART THAT I WORE OUT BY DRIVING THE CAR HE SAID WHY ISNT ON YOU
